title: NO ‘Deprogramming’ | Guests: Ret. Lt. Gen. Boykin & Gad Saad | 1/19/21
description:
Democratic Rep. Steve Cohen insultingly suggested the National Guard may turn on Joe Biden. Calls are growing to “deprogram” Trump supporters and start a 9/11-style commission to combat “domestic terrorism," including from Hilary Clinton. One of Gwyneth Paltrow’s infamous candles allegedly exploded. Retired Lt. Gen. Jerry Boykin discusses the National Guard in D.C., the far Left’s attempt to paint conservatives as the enemy, and the future of the republic. “Recall Gavin 2020” coalition founding member Mike Netter joins to discuss the growing movement to recall California Gov. Gavin Newsom. “The Parasitic Mind” author Dr. Gad Saad talks the behavioral psychology of the media, cancel culture, and what we must do to combat it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
